Reviews.Title: great value
Reviews.Author: Laron Taylor "laronvonbaron"
Reviews.Content: OOOPS did not put the 5 stars as they deserve ---human error--now fixed for the price you cant beat this deal--the 4-- 100 foot cables would have cost me 150.00 at best buy alonethe camers are cheap yes but they do work just fine--and i will be buying more this year for sure-im very happy with the product

ProductInfo.Features:
Plug and Play ready
All-in-one audio, video and power cable 100 feet
For camera with DC power only.
RCA for audio and BNC for video. 2.1mm Power connectors
Content: 8 Pack 100 feet video/audio/power cables in black, comes with 16 RCA Male to BNC Female connectors
ProductInfo.Name: VideoSecu 8 Pack 100ft Feet Surveillance BNC Video RCA Audio Cables CCTV CCD Security Camera Wires Cords with Bonus Connectors WC5
